author: doudrop
title: Demystify Blockchain in LATAM
description: LATAM financial regulators have been misguided by negative stigmas around crypto, causing them to associate blockchain with high risk.
solution: Intimate workshops with key stakeholders in each financial center to educate/explain how Cardano Blockchain can reshape economic activity
experience: We count on over 50 years of combined direct exposure and networking with financial and regulatory key stakeholders in LATAM jurisdictions.
